Name: White Tassel
Title: Ardent Argent: White Tassel
Desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

Talent.Name: White Tassel
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3204}Polearm Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
